nodes.text: Danison Varik was a Chagrian male Corellian chief scientist who worked for the Sith Empire during the Galactic War.

In 3640 BBY, Varik began producing prototype droids in a secure facility and use them to help the Empire in their conquest on Corellia. When Republic forces were able to break down the prison-grade vault doors, Varik activated his droids to eliminate them. After his droids were defeated, Varik confessed to being a collaborator and was taken into custody.
